TestCase.name: testNoNeedToClearJoinHint
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(a=[$0]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a)] +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $4)], joinType=[inner]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a, VARCHAR(2147483647) b, INTEGER c, VARCHAR(2147483647) d, BIGINT a0, VARCHAR(2147483647) b0, INTEGER c0, VARCHAR(2147483647) d0)] :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, t1, source: [CollectionTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a, VARCHAR(2147483647) b, INTEGER c, VARCHAR(2147483647) d)] +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, t2, source: [CollectionTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a, VARCHAR(2147483647) b, INTEGER c, VARCHAR(2147483647) d)]

LogicalProject(a=[$0]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a)] +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $4)], joinType=[inner], joinHints=[[[BROADCAST inheritPath:[0] options:[t1]]]]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a, VARCHAR(2147483647) b, INTEGER c, VARCHAR(2147483647) d, BIGINT a0, VARCHAR(2147483647) b0, INTEGER c0, VARCHAR(2147483647) d0)] :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, t1, source: [CollectionTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a, VARCHAR(2147483647) b, INTEGER c, VARCHAR(2147483647) d)] +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, t2, source: [CollectionTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a, VARCHAR(2147483647) b, INTEGER c, VARCHAR(2147483647) d)]

LogicalProject(a=[$0]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a)] +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $4)], joinType=[inner], joinHints=[[[BROADCAST inheritPath:[0] options:[t1]]]]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a, VARCHAR(2147483647) b, INTEGER c, VARCHAR(2147483647) d, BIGINT a0, VARCHAR(2147483647) b0, INTEGER c0, VARCHAR(2147483647) d0)] :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, t1, source: [CollectionTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a, VARCHAR(2147483647) b, INTEGER c, VARCHAR(2147483647) d)] +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, t2, source: [CollectionTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a, VARCHAR(2147483647) b, INTEGER c, VARCHAR(2147483647) d)]

TestCase.name: testClearJoinHintWithInvalidPropagationToView
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(a=[$0]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a)] +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $1)], joinType=[inner]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a, BIGINT a0, VARCHAR(2147483647) b, INTEGER c, VARCHAR(2147483647) d)] :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], hints=[[[ALIAS options:[t4]]]]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a)] : +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $4)], joinType=[inner]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a, VARCHAR(2147483647) b, INTEGER c, VARCHAR(2147483647) d, BIGINT a0, VARCHAR(2147483647) b0, INTEGER c0, VARCHAR(2147483647) d0)] : :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, t1, source: [CollectionTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a, VARCHAR(2147483647) b, INTEGER c, VARCHAR(2147483647) d)] : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, t2, source: [CollectionTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a, VARCHAR(2147483647) b, INTEGER c, VARCHAR(2147483647) d)] +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, t3, source: [CollectionTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a, VARCHAR(2147483647) b, INTEGER c, VARCHAR(2147483647) d)]

LogicalProject(a=[$0]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a)] +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $1)], joinType=[inner], joinHints=[[[BROADCAST inheritPath:[0] options:[t3]]]]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a, BIGINT a0, VARCHAR(2147483647) b, INTEGER c, VARCHAR(2147483647) d)] :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], hints=[[[ALIAS options:[t4]]]]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a)] : +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $4)], joinType=[inner], joinHints=[[[BROADCAST inheritPath:[0] options:[t1]][BROADCAST inheritPath:[0, 0, 0] options:[t3]]]], hints=[[[ALIAS inheritPath:[0] options:[t4]]]]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a, VARCHAR(2147483647) b, INTEGER c, VARCHAR(2147483647) d, BIGINT a0, VARCHAR(2147483647) b0, INTEGER c0, VARCHAR(2147483647) d0)] : :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, t1, source: [CollectionTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a, VARCHAR(2147483647) b, INTEGER c, VARCHAR(2147483647) d)] : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, t2, source: [CollectionTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a, VARCHAR(2147483647) b, INTEGER c, VARCHAR(2147483647) d)] +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, t3, source: [CollectionTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a, VARCHAR(2147483647) b, INTEGER c, VARCHAR(2147483647) d)]

LogicalProject(a=[$0]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a)] +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $1)], joinType=[inner], joinHints=[[[BROADCAST inheritPath:[0] options:[t3]]]]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a, BIGINT a0, VARCHAR(2147483647) b, INTEGER c, VARCHAR(2147483647) d)] :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], hints=[[[ALIAS options:[t4]]]]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a)] : +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $4)], joinType=[inner], joinHints=[[[BROADCAST inheritPath:[0] options:[t1]]]], hints=[[[ALIAS inheritPath:[0] options:[t4]]]]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a, VARCHAR(2147483647) b, INTEGER c, VARCHAR(2147483647) d, BIGINT a0, VARCHAR(2147483647) b0, INTEGER c0, VARCHAR(2147483647) d0)] : :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, t1, source: [CollectionTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a, VARCHAR(2147483647) b, INTEGER c, VARCHAR(2147483647) d)] : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, t2, source: [CollectionTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a, VARCHAR(2147483647) b, INTEGER c, VARCHAR(2147483647) d)] +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, t3, source: [CollectionTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT a, VARCHAR(2147483647) b, INTEGER c, VARCHAR(2147483647) d)]
